queryParameters.name: sinceDatetime
queryParameters.description: The format of the sinceDateTime parameter must conform to ISO 8601 standard date notation.  For best results, use a full datetime that includes the time zone.

queryParameters.name: nextPageToken
queryParameters.description: Token representation of a datetime returned by the Get Paging Token endpoint.  This endpoint will return activities after this datetime

queryParameters.name: activityTypeIds
queryParameters.description: Comma-separated list of activity type ids. These can be retrieved with the Get Activity Types API.

queryParameters.name: assetIds
queryParameters.description: Id of the primary asset for an activity.  This is based on the primary asset id of a given activity type.  Should only be used when a single activity type is set

queryParameters.name: listId
queryParameters.description: Id of a static list.  If set, will only return activities of members of this static list.

queryParameters.name: batchSize
queryParameters.description: Maximum number of records to return.  Maximum and default is 300.

queryParameters.name: leadIds
queryParameters.description: Comma-separated list of lead ids.  If set, will only return activities of the leads with these ids.  Allows up to 30 entries.
